title: Williams County Sheriff's Office investigating accidental shooting of 3-year-old
content:
WILLISTON, N.D. - On Dec. 5, at approximately 1:30 p.m., the Williams County Sheriff’s Office responded to a rural Williston address for a report of a gunshot.
The Sheriff’s Office is currently investigating the accidental shooting of a three-year-old male.
The child is currently in stable but serious condition in a Fargo hospital. As of right now, this appears to be an accidental self-inflicted shooting.
The investigation is ongoing.
